title: 529 13 "The Fishman Island Will Be Annihilated?! Sharley's Prophecy!"Transliteration: "Gyojin-tō Metsubō!? Shārī no Yogen" (Japanese:魚人島滅亡!? シャーリーの予言) Yoshihiro Ueda Hirohiko Kamisaka December 25, 2011(2011-12-25) March 6, 2022
transformers_text: 529 13 The Fish man Island Will Be Annihilated S harley's Prophecy Transliteration Gy oj in t Met sub Sh r no Yog en Japanese Yoshihiro Ueda Hiro hi ko Kami saka December 25 2011 2011 12 25 March 6 2022 Sanji is given a transfusion from two ok am as on the Mermaid Cafe a local restaurant in the port town of Coral Hill Chopper reveals that not only has Luffy been poisoned but thanks to the captain's battle with Magellan he has built up an immunity to it Meanwhile C amie asks Madame S harley a fortune teller and proprietor of the restaurant about Sanji and has Luffy and Us opp enter her room It is revealed that S harley has predicted the Great Pirate Era and the past wars including the death of White beard Later the Straw Hats reunite with Brook and Papp a gu It is also revealed that Van der De cken had sent a letter once a week to the Princess As a result Neptune and his sons formed an army and have been finding Van der De cken for years When Luffy asks about the candy factory nearby he learns that the island is under the protection of Big Mom since White beard's death Meanwhile S harley is dismayed about her prediction that the island will be eventually destroyed by Luffy
tf_idf_text: fish man island annihilate harleys prophecy transliteration meet sub yog japanese yoshihiro ueda hiro kami saka december march sanji give transfusion two mermaid cafe local restaurant port town coral hill chopper reveal not luffy poison thanks captain battle magellan build immunity meanwhile amie asks madame harley fortune teller proprietor restaurant sanji luffy opp enter room reveal harley predict great pirate era past war include death white beard later straw hat reunite brook papp also reveal van der cken send letter week princess result neptune son form army find van der cken year luffy ask candy factory nearby learns island protection big mom since white beard death meanwhile harley dismay prediction island eventually destroy luffy
